message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $82. It's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $82. I'm willing to go up to $75, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $79. It's the lowest I can go without losing money. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $79. I'm willing to go up to $76, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
